channel.title: 2 error exceptions
channel.description:
1st: [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.createGroundItem(client.java:14323) at ItemHandler.spawnItem(ItemHandler.java:103) at ItemHandler.addItem(ItemHandler.java:94) at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItem(NPCHandler.java:1115) at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:702) at server.main(server.java:72) [/code]
2nd: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.RuntimeException: Stack empty at stream.endFrameVarSize(stream.java:189) at client.sendMessage(client.java:10768) at client.levelup(client.java:5781) at client.addSkillXP(client.java:13458) at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItem(NPCHandler.java:1097) at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:702) at server.main(server.java:72)[/code]
if u need anymore info like wats around it, just ask im desperate to have these fixed, server crashes like every 15 minutes bcuz of these 2 exceptions..............

Un-do any recent coding if this never used to happen, or use a server restarter every 10-15mins or so.

item.title: 2 error exceptions
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

1st:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at client.createGroundItem(client.java:14323)
        at ItemHandler.spawnItem(ItemHandler.java:103)
        at ItemHandler.addItem(ItemHandler.java:94)
        at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItem(NPCHandler.java:1115)
        at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:702)
        at server.main(server.java:72)

2nd:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.RuntimeException: Stack empty at stream.endFrameVarSize(stream.java:189) at client.sendMessage(client.java:10768) at client.levelup(client.java:5781) at client.addSkillXP(client.java:13458) at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItem(NPCHandler.java:1097) at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:702) at server.main(server.java:72)

if u need anymore info like wats around it, just ask im desperate to have these fixed, server crashes like every 15 minutes bcuz of these 2 exceptions…
